scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.build:netlify: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy-check: npm run build:netlify && echo 'Build completed successfully!'
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function rmdir(dir) { try { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Cleaned:', dir); } } catch (e) { console.log('Skip:', dir, e.message); } } rmdir('client/build'); rmdir('client/node_modules/.cache');"
